website_summaries.verdict: The Epson Home Cinema 3000 projector lacks an audio system, which is more common for home theater than home entertainment projectors,   but it delivers a high-quality image that can stand up to ambient light.
pros: Accepts 3D signals from video devices like Blu-ray players and cable TV
cons: Minor image-quality issues on particularly demanding scenes

website_summaries.verdict: The Epson Home Cinema 1440 1080p 3LCD Projector delivers excellent output quality and a bright enough image to stand up to daylight in a family room with lots of windows.
pros: Can throw a big image that can stand up to ambient light in a bright room
Excellent image quality in our tests
cons: Lag time is a little long for serious gamers
Lacks video-processing features that are common at this price

customer_reviews.title: Bright & clear - very impressive, very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and clear picture - The built in speaker is adequate and you don't notice the (minimal) fan noise when watching a program. No setup required. Plugged in a FireStick that was powered from the projectors USB port. The image was being projected onto a painted wall in a conservatory. On a sunny day the image was fine, at night it's very good. Would recommend and would buy another one if required.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great, but....
customer_reviews.text: Great little projector, does pretty much as expected, and its Epson so its decent quality. Only major fault is that it does not seem able to play avi files from usb stick without converting everything first. An irritating fault which Epson could easily sort, but for whatever reason have decided not to. I'm going to buy another projector for the living room, but due to this fault it will NOT be an Epson though. Shame really as otherwise its great.
customer_reviews.author: pws edinburgh

customer_reviews.title: The best 1080P projector
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, I am using now for 2 years and for a 1080p video project a cannot wait more from it. I had another one before and the sound that cames from it was absolutely terrible. Exceed all my expectations, regarding the delays (playing with a PS4) or during Movie from my Apple TV. I just wish it is a little bit more silent, might go for a special box :)
customer_reviews.author: Adelean

customer_reviews.title: extremely happy with the purchase however it has its drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with the purchase. Supports full HD 1080p resolution natively. Can cast extremely large screen without losing display quality and the video is visible even in a room full of background light. It has dual hdmi port and one single usb a port .( also incudes vga port and usb b port) and rca port for audio output. ((when conected to ps3 make sure digital dolby is off in Ps3's audio setting))
customer_reviews.author: Ab

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: What can I say but wow! Been using it over Christmas for PS4, blueray, fire stick , fire hd and Samsung tablet, plus a Bose surround sound. Kids and adults thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Supernavman

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product and has some features that work really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this little gem. You'll need extra speakers but the image quality and options are fab.
customer_reviews.author: jamie s

customer_reviews.title: It is really bright and has an amazing image quality
customer_reviews.text: The projector surprised me. It is really bright and has an amazing image quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so far very happy: )
customer_reviews.text: Have the projector for a month, so far very happy :)
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent projector but no sound output.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent projector - would recommend to anyone who wants a quality projector for Apple TV/Amazon Fire/PS4. Only downfall is that it does not have an audio output so you have to buy an hdmi splitter if you want to output sound to external speakers. The single built-in projector speaker is crackly at higher volumes and in general is too quiet with respect to the cooling fan...
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Walton

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding! This projector is better than I'd hoped. I'm using with Sky Q and projecting onto a wall (12 foot diagonal). The wall is painted with Dulux light and space paint that is slightly reflective. HD programmes are excellent. The other great advantage is that the projector doesn't have to be placed dead centre. I have it on a window cill about 3 feet off horizontal centre.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet

customer_reviews.title: picture size and picture quality is really really good. Great piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Recently brought and using as a tv for home, picture size and picture quality is really really good. Great piece of kit. Reasonably priced too.
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Good Machine, pity about the Instruction Manual access!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent machine, much better than my old Epson. Am just getting used to the versatility of it, but why Oh! why do Epson have to make it so difficult to download the 166 page instruction manual into the hard drive. Have just done this (eventually) so that I can read it on a Windows 8.1 desktop and a Windows 10 laptop but the instruction guide to do it bears no resemblance to what you actually need to do. Do they need to protect the copyright so much when I have actually paid for the machine? Come on Epson, I am sure it could be made simpler.
customer_reviews.author: J. Longworth

customer_reviews.title: Great image but let down by poor audio and lack of an audio out.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the image it produces. The darker the room the better the image but even with the lights on most things are watchable. It's not too great with the curtains open on a sunny day though. The quick corner keystone setting makes it relatively easy to set up, even when I have it in the corner of the room and directed at the screen at an angle. Only 4 stars though because it doesn't have an audio out and the inbuilt speaker is a bit poor. In order to get better sound quality I either use a fire tv stick or pc to link to a bluetooth soundbar.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W

customer_reviews.title: Im loving it, probably the most expensive thing I ...
customer_reviews.text: Im loving it, probably the most expensive thing I bought in my life but totally worth it. My living room is very bright, there is a ceiling window but I am able to use this projector even in daylight!
customer_reviews.author: Alper

customer_reviews.title: Good quality equipment and well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent quality projector which was exactly what we were looking for. Although it was rather expensive (I missed the special offer) it was an excellent buy .
customer_reviews.author: Shanks

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous data projector
customer_reviews.text: As the title suggests this is a fabulous projector which seems to be aimed at the presentation market rather than home cinema. The sharpness and brightness are excellent and the picture is large and impressive. Maybe four stars is a bit mean, - it is only because for me the picture let's it down when viewing video. Compared to a DLP projector at a similar price point the tonal representation in films falls short and the picture can lack depth, most noticeably in dark scenes. This is a well-documented feature of LCDs. On the other hand the lack of rainbow effect is a real plus and it looks great. At this price you can't expect everything.
customer_reviews.author: Mac user

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Very good projection and powerful LEDs. Crisp image that I have also used for watching films
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: and the Eco setting is fine, much quieter and certainly bright enough for most ...
customer_reviews.text: The projector was very well packaged, and amazingly simple to set up with my 2010 17" Macbook Pro, using the necessary adaptor that I'd bought in advance. Once connected, the projector just worked for a Keynote presentation - couldn't have been easier. Very straightforward to adjust settings, and the Eco setting is fine, much quieter and certainly bright enough for most purposes. I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Clague

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and intuitively easy to use. A great little projector
customer_reviews.author: HooHaa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my meetings in any light
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Perfect for my meetings in any light. The ability to have projector on an angle to the wall but still project a square image is fantastic. Quality and brightness/colour is brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great produckt, clear view hd. compatybility with all hdmi device laptops, xbox, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Karol

customer_reviews.title: Excellent image quality and quiet running
customer_reviews.text: Excellent image quality and quiet running. However I've had to return it as it started to overheat after only 5 mins. Wanted to buy a replacement one, but the price has rocketed by £200 in two weeks and there seems to be a shortage.
customer_reviews.author: Mr G J Tough

customer_reviews.title: Best LCD Projector for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Digital Projector. Worked perfectly straight out of the box. Excellent delivery from Amazon. Also at an extremely competitive price. Full instructions are on a CD. Very comprehensive, but will take a long time to absorb. Many features, the main being excellent luminosity at 3000 lumens and the resolution at 1980 X 1200 WUXGA HD. Got a seven feet wide 16:10 picture from 4 metres distance. Well done Epson and Amazon. Will continue to buy through this source.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen K.

customer_reviews.title: Great video, audio sounds like your in a bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: Video quality great, sound 3 out of 10. No audio out. I had to use a HDMI audio splitter, now sound comes out my sound system. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Yalcin

customer_reviews.title: Great present for the family!
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. Haven't watched it much since Xmas, mind you, could do with more permanent mounting (ours sits on the coffee table!)
customer_reviews.author: Dootsie

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant projector
customer_reviews.text: This projector is brilliant high quality more clear fully HD more better than cheap projector is low native resolution not clear on 1080p. This is good for PC gaming & big movies & mobile phone give huge screen 103 inch just 3.3metres away from projector in living room.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Furgusson

customer_reviews.title: Good Full HD projector with simple setup. Using in office and experience is good.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful projector with loads of features at reasonable cost. Its setup is simple and it came with carrying case/bag which was a plus. -Screen is full HD and clarity wise it's very good -We can adjust it's screen size. It has a nice feature "horizontal & vertical keystone correction" -We can connect projector via VGA, HDMI,MHL and USB port, we can connect it with Wireless through Wi-Fi USB receiver -Minimum Projection distance is 1.8 mtr -audio output - 3.5 mm stereo plug I do not have any other technical feedback now, so far experience has been good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: utterly fabulous picture - but must use alternative speakers
customer_reviews.text: Picuture - i have a 100" screen: it fills this with ease - and i mean beautifully - really magnificent picture quality, blue ray standard, or better. The speakers - be honest are utterly useless. I play via my pc and sound bar or headphones. But great kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable quality
customer_reviews.text: I've been meaning to set up a projector like this at home for a while. Unfortunately, projectors were either very expensive and way beyond the spec I needed or cheap as chips and pretty rotten. This is easy to set up, easy to use and not much more expensive than my sound system. So far, we've tried it in twilight and the dark, in the summer house, behind the summer house, on the living room wall and the dining room ceiling. When it gets warmer, we're going to use the neighbour's white wall to set it up on the patio, All very satisfactory. So, if you want an affordable home cinema system, this is a great place to start.
customer_reviews.author: El Loro

customer_reviews.title: Sharp as Chips
customer_reviews.text: I've used projectors, both Epson and Sony, in work before but never at home and this is some piece of kit. It works really well in daylight and in a darkened room. The picture quality is excellent with the colour being exceptionally sharp. The projector is easy to operate either by the remote control or by the buttons on the unit itself. It states that the lamp and filter have a life of 10,000 hours so that should last some time. There is a little bit of noise but when you are watching a film you won't really pay much heed to this.
customer_reviews.author: Pádraig Ó

product_meta.title: Epson EB-U04 Full HD 1080p Home Cinema/Gaming Projector (3LCD, 1080p, 3000 Lumens, 10,000 Hour Lamp Life) - White
product_meta.description:
Epson EB-U04 Full HD 1080p Home Cinema/Gaming Projector (3LCD, 1080p, 3000 Lumens, 10,000 Hour Lamp Life) - White.

BOX CONTAINS


 * Epson projector
 * Power cable
 * Computer cable
 * Remote control with batteries
 * Carry bag
 * User documentation
feature_bullets: Bright output - 3,000 lumens white and colour light output and 3 LCD technology
Experience high quality images - WUXGA, full HD resolution and 15000:1 contrast ratio
Quick and easy to set-up - automatic vertical keystone correction
2 x HDMI with MHL support via HDMI 1, lamp life up to 10,000 hours in economy mode
View two sources at once with built-in split-screen function

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
